-1.title: Who Is Ollie Pemberton? - Part Two

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The New Adventures (TV Series 2007–2009)

-1.plot: With Ollie Pemberton now overwritten as Danny, the Doctor must make the difficult decision of choosing whether to reveal the truth to Danny.

1.title: A New Beginning

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The New Adventures (TV Series 2007–2009)

1.plot: The Doctor is recovering from his recent regeneration, with the help of Josh, they work together to stop a new alien threat.

2.title: The Cyber Experiment - Part One

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The New Adventures (TV Series 2007–2009)

2.plot: The Doctor takes Josh to 1980, where UNIT are under siege from the Cybermen.

3.title: The Cyber Experiment - Part Two

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The New Adventures (TV Series 2007–2009)

3.plot: With UNIT under Cyber control, the Doctor must act quickly to save the future.

4.title: The Dream Room

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The New Adventures (TV Series 2007–2009)

4.plot: The Doctor takes Josh to a leisure planet, where they go to enjoy the relaxing Dream Room, however it is cursed.

5.title: Goodbye

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The New Adventures (TV Series 2007–2009)

5.plot: Josh considers leaving the Doctor, as a last trip, the Doctor takes Josh to a planet of tranquility, to say a final goodbye.

6.title: Double Trouble

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The New Adventures (TV Series 2007–2009)

6.plot: When both Doctors meet on a woodland somewhere in the universe, they begin to be hunted by a beast.

1.title: Reunion

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The New Adventures (TV Series 2007–2009)

1.plot: The Doctor lands on Earth and reunites with Josh, only to find themselves trapped within an everlasting time loop, caused by an old foe of the Doctor.

2.title: The Day of the Mekkons

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The New Adventures (TV Series 2007–2009)

2.plot: The Doctor and Josh arrive on the planet Sta-bux, where they find the mysterious Carrie Black, experimenting on human clones.

3.title: The Age of the Mekkons

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The New Adventures (TV Series 2007–2009)

3.plot: After the Doctor is shot and killed, it is up to Josh to stop the Mekkon uprising.

6.title: Almost Human

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The New Adventures (TV Series 2007–2009)

6.plot: The alien creature that previously attacked the Doctor returns and turns the Doctor human, now known as ??? and with Josh's memory lost, they both attend college as friends. However ??? finds himself with memories of the Doctor, he just needs to find himself.

7.title: Insurrection of the Daleks - Part One

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The New Adventures (TV Series 2007–2009)

7.plot: The Doctor and Josh arrive on a colony where the inhabitants are creating a new kind of machine to help them survive.

8.title: Insurrection of the Daleks - Part Two

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The New Adventures (TV Series 2007–2009)

8.plot: The Daleks launch their attack on the colony base. The Doctor and Josh are running out of time as they finally reach the power source of the Daleks.

1.title: Two of a Kind

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The New Adventures (TV Series 2007–2009)

1.plot: Having just regenerated, the Doctor arrives back on Earth to discover himself. Whilst in the recovery process, the Doctor meets Danny, who's been possessed by an Orak, and must try and find a way to cure him.

6.title: Asinta

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The New Adventures (TV Series 2007–2009)

6.plot: The Doctor and Danny arrive on a woodland planet to relax, however the planet's name is discovered, the Doctor must solve the mystery as to its existence.

7.title: You're Going To Die

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The New Adventures (TV Series 2007–2009)

7.plot: Moments after the Doctor's regeneration, time takes a different route and Danny discovers a new life.

8.title: Death Day

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The New Adventures (TV Series 2007–2009)

8.plot: After being told what needs to be done, the corrupt timeline begins to close in on the Doctor and Danny.

imdb.title: Doctor Who: The New Adventures
akas: Doctor Who: The New Adventures (United Kingdom)
plot: Having just regenerated, the Doctor meets Josh, a regular college student, and they encounter a series of new adventures in time and space.::Joseph Weightman
